2051020.name: Magneko
2051020.description: This is a cat who lives in a witch's house.   Punished for some mistakes, the cat became a magical cat with magnetic powers.   To become a normal cat, the cat must collect enough fish.   You need to switch the cat's magnetic magic to move, use it to solve puzzles, and get through the level.   The cat can't break the spell until you have collected enough dried fish.  Let's use magnetic magic to help cats return to normal life~
